title: Smart Data Models - Battery
description: Represent a physical battery with its hardware specifications

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be Battery

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

refDevice.description: Relationship. Model:'http://schema.org/URL'. Device providing the measured data about the battery

status.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/Text'. Current operational status of the item

cycleLife.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'. Numeric value of the load/unload operation cycles for the item'

autonomyTime.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'. Autonomy of operations of the item without further charge.

rechargeTime.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'. Time for the full charge of the battery.

acPowerInput.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'. Numeric value in volts for the alternate current charge. Units:'volts'

acPowerOutput.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'. Numeric value in volts for the alternate output. Units:'volts'

dcPowerInput.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'. Numeric value in volts for the continuous current charge. Units:'volts'

dcPowerOutput.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'. Numeric value in volts for the continuous current charge. Units:'volts'
